body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our support team. My name is Russell Hughes and I work for Pacific Hotels. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Katherine. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm facing an issue with noisy neighbors in my hotel room.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. Can you please provide me with your room number and the time the noise is most disruptive?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm in room three zero two zero and the noise usually starts around ten thirty at night.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the details. We will address this promptly. Is there anything else you would like to add?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. I appreciate your assistance.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad I could help, Katherine. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a pleasant stay!
